slide_13.value: It’s tough to know what Kidz Bop will censor and when. In fact, censorship rates have gone up since the first album was released in 2001.

slide_14.value: Since 2001, the proportion of censored words has increased by X. But, what’s driving that?

slide_15.value: We grouped the censored words in categories: alcohol & drugs, sexual, profanity, violence, identity, and other.
